[Sling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=13)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
